translations: adj.机会主义的；投机取巧的

sentences.sentence: Many of the strongly opportunistic plants are the common weeds of fields and gardens.
sentences.translation: 许多非常机会主义的植物都是田野和花园中常见的杂草。

sentences.sentence: These kinds of systems are primarily designed to protect against the sort of opportunistic smash and grab attack that makes up the majority of burglaries.
sentences.translation: 这类系统主要用来防止投机取巧和掠夺，这造成了大多数入室盗窃。

sentences.sentence: At the end of the day, these kinds of systems are primarily designed to protect against the sort of opportunistic smash-and-grab attack that makes up the majority of burglaries.
sentences.translation: 归根结底，这类系统主要用于防止投机取巧的砸橱窗抢劫袭击，大部分的入室盗窃都属于这类袭击。
